      • setMaxRApduDataSize

        public void setMaxRApduDataSize(int sizeInBytes)
        This function sets the max data size that can be read from the Type 4 Tag We will take the most restrictive value between: - the reader's constraint (obtained from getMaxTransceiveLength()) - the tag's constraint
        Parameters:
        sizeInBytes -

      • setMaxCApduDataSize

        public void setMaxCApduDataSize(int sizeInBytes)
        This function sets the max data size that can be sent to the Type 4 Tag We will take the most restrictive value between: - the reader's constraint (obtained from getMaxTransceiveLength()) - the tag's constraint
        Parameters:
        sizeInBytes -
